name: Wandering in the Nightmare
description:
Wandering in the nightmare is a Top Down 3d puzzle game.

You are an adventurer who loves to camp outside. During one of this trip you get stuck in a weird dream and have to find a way to wake yourself up.

Thanks for trying our game.

Please if you have a webgl issue feel free to press the download botton.
The Wandering in the Nightmare team:

Sound designer:
Colin Yan
Programmers: 
Ivan Chandra
Mocanu Bogdan(Tycro Games)
3d Artists:
Manuel Ghezzo De Badin
Matteo Moliterno
Game Designer:
Matteo Lorenzini

Thanks again!
